metadata.name: üçìStrawberry Waffles üçì
metadata.description:
üçìRecipe üçì

-3 eggs
-100g milk
-50g icing sugar
-160g flour
-40g cornstarch
-4g baking powder
-two drops vanilla extract
-50g melted butter (unsalted)

mixing 3 eggs, 100g milk and 50g icing sugar together, then add 160g flour, 40g cornstarchÔºå 4g baking powderÔºå 2 drops of vanilla extractÔºå stir well. in the end adding 50g melted butter, mix until it become a smooth mixture. 

pour the mixture on the waffle maker, wait till it fully cooked.

serve with fresh cream & sliced strawberry.

enjoy :) 

____________________________________________

The art also comes with a still illustration (signed, digital jpg) and a .png stamp for collector & all bidders. 

This is my first piece on FND, I hope you will love it & show me some love.
